basics.label: HEALTHCARE ADMINISTRATOR/OPERATIONAL AND STAFF REORG
basics.summary: High-energy Manager, Analyst, and Executive Assistant. Successful in building and motivating dynamic teams, streamlining costs, boosting company morale and revenue through innovative management techniques, including all forms of social media.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for all staff which included office clerks, surgeons, remote transcriptionists, part-time students, medical assistants, in-house biller, and in-house transcriptionist.
highlights: Negotiated all terms of new contract to carve out 95% of in-house billing to an off-site medical billing company.
Liaison between SDHS and 47 vendors like IT specialists, all credentialed hospitals, medical supply vendors, OSHA Reps, etc.
Created a comprehensive project plan for total relocation of the practice.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed as Project Manager on 3 large compliance-related controls regarding a new database developed for Risk Solutions Team.
highlights: Assisted compliance questions from fulfillment field reps regarding business unit procedures.
Used strong communication skills and developed solid relationships with all teams.
